external_references.description: Shilko, J., et al. (2021, October 7). FIN12: The Prolific Ransomware Intrusion Threat Actor That Has Aggressively Pursued Healthcare Targets. Retrieved June 15, 2023.

description: [Wizard Spider](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0102) has used WMIC and vssadmin to manually delete volume shadow copies. [Wizard Spider](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0102) has also used [Conti](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0575) ransomware to delete volume shadow copies automatically with the use of vssadmin.(Citation: Mandiant FIN12 Oct 2021)
